member_organisations:
Centexbel is a membership organisation, in Belgium all companies registered as 'textile company' are by law a member of Centexbel. Further, Centexbel has also voluntary members, both in Belgium and worldwide.

fields_of_interest: Consumers, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives: CEN standardisation, European Technology Platform for Textile & clothing, construction products, REACH, Personal protective equipment, medical devices.
organisation_name: CENTRE SCIENTIFIQUE & TECHNIQUE DE L'INDUSTRIE TEXTILE BELGE (Centexbel)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
membership:
Centexbel is member from: 
*TEXTRANET - Textile Transfer Network, see: http://www.textranet.net/ 
*European Technology Platform for the Future of Textiles and Clothing , see: http://www.textile-platform.eu 
*ECP4 - European Composites, Plastics and Polymer Processing Platform, see: http://www.ecp4.eu/ 
*Fedustria, see www.fedustria.be; 
*FISCH - Flanders Innovation Hub for Sustainable Chemistry www.fi-sch.be 
*SIM-Flanders – Strategic Initiative Materials Flanders www.sim-flanders.be  
*Tensinet - www.tensinet.com 
*UpTex - www.up-tex.fr 
*VLOOT - Vlaamse Overkoepelende Organisatie van Technologieverstrekkers. – www.vloot.be 
*PlastiWin - clusters.wallonie.be/plastiwin-en 
*BIOWIN - www.biowin.org 
*CCILV CCI Liège Verviers Namur - www.ccilvn.be 
*CLUBTEX - Association for the Promotion of Technical Textiles - www.clubtex.com
goals__remit:
Centexbel was founded in 1950 at the initiative of Fedustria to reinforce the competitive position of the Belgian textile companies.  
 
To fulfil this mission, Centexbel offers an extensive range of activities to the textile industry, including Research & Development, testing, certification, consultancy, and training.
